name: OR_LOG_PREOP_NURSE
description: The OR_LOG_PREOP_NURSE table contains OR management system log preop nurses.

columns.name: LOG_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the surgical log the pre-op nurse refers to.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The number of the line of the pre-op nurse in the surgical log.

columns.name: PREOP_NURSES_ID
columns.description: The unique IDs of nurses assigned to pre-op for the surgery in the surgical log.
